resources.string: Do you really want to Quit?
Already a user? Sign In using Nepal Telecom Websms credentials
*Multiple Recipients can be seperated by a ;
Network Currently Unavailable. \n Please Try Again Later.
Network Busy!!!!! \n Please Try Again Later.
Server is not responding!!!! \n Please wait or Try Again Later.

Follow the Instruction for input field(1. and 2.) 
 For Nepal Telecom Post-paid Subscribers: 
 1:-> Mobile Number 
 2:->PUK No.(To get PUK ,type PUK send SMS to 1400 
 For Nepal Telecom Pre-paid Subscriber: 
 1:-> Mobile Number 
 2:-> SIM Serial Number(19 digit) 
 For Subscribers having Nepal Telecom Active 
 C-Phone Number: 
 1:-> Phone Number 
 2:-> FWP Number 
 For Subscribers having Nepal Telecom Active 
 CDMA Number: 
 1:-> Mobile Number 
 2:-> R-UIM Number

Note:Please make sure that your mobile phone 
 is switched on before submitting the 
 information in order to recieve code 
 immediately. 
 Enter your Existing WebSms Log in ID and 
 PUK(PostPaid User) or 
 SIM Serial Number(PrePaid User) or 
 FWP Number(C-Phone User) or 
 R-UIM Number(CDMA User)
Already Got the Validation Code?? \n Click Here
